page.title: 03MOTORWAY POLICE
page.content:
The{Police Station}is situated just north of junction 16 on the{M5} motorway. There are 79 people{employed}in the building. There are 1 Chief Inspector,3 Inspectors,9 Sergeants,56 Constables and 10 Civilians.
Their job is to patrol the{motorway, making sure the traffic is flowing well and checking for{accidents.}The motorway is busy during working days, and at a busy period there could be 4,000 cars an hour using it. The Police use a Rover 3.5 V8 for {patrolling}and use a Range Rover for towing cars out of accidents.They also have Ford Granadas for other work. Among equipment they have in the building is a map with lights on to tell them about{weather conditions,}so they can make plans in advance.
